name: Escort the King
description:
In this game the goal is to get the King back to his Castle through all those fierce beasts, a few footman will help you on the way, command them wisely!

To control your Units just click on em and then you will see the movement pattern, this game is turn based so you can move with each unit one time and then the enemies move or attack.

Stats of Units:
King: 1 DMG 5 HP 2 Move
Footman: 2 DMG 3 HP 3 Move
Blue Enemy: 1 DMG 3 HP 2 Move
Yellow Enemy: 1 DMG 2 HP 3 Move
Green Enemy: 1 DMG 1 HP 5 Move

The goal of the game is to get back to the castle and defeat all Enemies!

You can watch the progress on https://www.twitch.tv/dranikoda

We worked about 30 hours on this game which is a bit away from the 48 hours but we aint got more time :D
